Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Roche Elecsys family of immunoassay analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Elecsys Troponin T STAT electrochemiluminescent immunoassay for quantitative determination of troponin T in serum and plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro measurement of troponin T in human serum and plasma to aid in diagnosis and risk stratification of acute coronary syndrome, cardiac risk in chronic renal failure, and selection of therapy in patients with elevated cardiac troponin T levels
